definitions.definition: A love song that is sung directly to one's love interest , especially one performed below the window of a loved one in the evening .
An instrumental composition in several movements .
examples: “Eine kleine Nachtmusik” is a well-known serenade written by Mozart.

main_definition: A love song that is sung directly to one's love interest , especially one performed below the window of a loved one in the evening .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) An instrumental composition in several movements .
